bwwExcerpt: In another devastating blow to the "West Coast Has Taste" community, the musical Almost Famous has opened on Broadway, after a well-received premiere run in San Diego, to put another nail in that idealistic California coffin. It is a production so dull, with poor direction, ugly sets, uninteresting ...
